https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6JBeIGkoJZPCU9hCwtOgh0EEcda.jpg The day Kara turned 18, he had to lose everything, a gift from his grandfather that he would never forget in his lifetime. Taken in by a family who believes he is poor, he works towards supporting himself and new relationships. 18++ Forever Love
